item.title: How to edit my client
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

[quote=“00kai, post:3, topic:278241”][quote author=Jimmyhead521 link=topic=367229.msg2782555#msg2782555 date=1242159329]
ok that is kinda simple find the file called EGUI.java then find the current word for an example if i wanted to change “Mopar” into “Coke” then you find the word “Mopar” and replace it when you save it click compile and its done
[/quote]

Can u help me please?? how do you change the background of a client? like the picture behind it?? PLEASE HELP!! ill REP!![/quote]

Class30_sub2_sub1_sub1
